articles.author: Christian Edwards, Daria Tarasova-Markina, Pierre Meilhan, Caitlin Danaher
articles.title: US, Ukraine and European officials hold ‘excellent exchange’ in Paris, in highest level talks in weeks - CNN
articles.description: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio and Steve Witkoff, President Donald Trump’s international envoy, held high level talks with Ukrainian and European officials in Paris at a summit Thursday aimed at bolstering Ukraine’s defenses against Russia’s unrelenting in…
